dimensionalpocketsii.command.recoverpock: /recoverpocket <chunk x>, <chunk z> (Specifies the Pocket to recover by the Chunk Position)
/recoverpocket length (This will show how many pockets exist in the Registry)
Pocket specified does not exist in the Registry.
You must have Cheats enabled to use that Command.
You cannot recover this pocket as it does not belong to you.
You must be in Creative mode to use that Command.
You must have at least 1 empty Inventory Slot available to recover a Pocket.
/recoverpocketop <chunk x>, <chunk y> (Specifies the Pocket to recover by the Chunk Position)
Pocket specified does not exist in the Registry.
You must be a Server Operator to use that Command.
You must be in Creative mode to use that Command.

dimensionalpocketsii.error.block.usage: You cannot place that Block inside a Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.error.item.usage: You cannot use that Item inside a Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.welcome_three: Please see the Dimensional Tome in your inventory for more information.

dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.name: Dimensional Pockets II Config
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.height_i: Allows you to change the the internal height of Pockets
Limited to the range of between 15 and 255
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.height_e: Allows you to change the the internal height of Enhanced Pockets
Limited to the range of between 31 and 255
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.jump_ran: Allows you to change the the range between jumpable Focus Blocks
Limited to the range of between 4 and 32
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.use_stru: Whether or not blocked Structures can be used inside of a Pocket
See the below for a list of currently blocked Structures.
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.use_item: Whether or not blocked Items can be used inside of a Pocket
See the below for a list of currently blocked Items.
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.use_comm: Whether or not blocked Commands can be used inside of a Pocket
See the below for a list of currently blocked Commands.
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.chunks_i: Whether to keep the Chunks inside the Pocket Dimension Loaded
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.walls_in: Whether the walls of Pockets can be destroyed in Creative Mode
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.book_inf: Whether or not Players are given a Dimensional Tome upon new spawn
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.replace_: Whether if reducing the Internal Height of Pocket that is larger will make it smaller
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.hostile_: Whether or not Hostile Mobs should be stopped from spawning
Whether this mod will print [INFO] messages to the console/log
Whether this mod will print [DEBUG] messages to the console/log
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.textures: Whether or not connected textures work inside Pockets
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.blocked_: List of Structures that are blocked when inside a Pocket
List of Items that are blocked when inside a Pocket
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.op_level: Allows you to change the required OP level to bypass Blocked Commands
Limited to the range of between 0 and 4
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.blocked_: List of Commands that are blocked when inside a Pocket
dimensionalpocketsii.gui.config.backups_: Whether or not the mod will create backups of Pocket information
A restart is required for this option to take effect

dimensionalpocketsii.gui.help.armour_wor: Applied Preview Slot
This slot shows how your armour will look
if you choose to apply the colours &
modules.
Removed Preview Slot
This slow shows how your armour will look
if you choose to remove colours & modules.
Armour Colour Slot
This slot will set the colour of the main
body of whichever piece of armour you
have in the Focused Armour Slot.
Wings Colour Slot
This slot will set the colour of the wings
if you have an Elytraplate in the Focused
Armour Slot.
This Slot uses dye Items for colours.
Use a Dimensional Shard for Pocket Purple.
Focused Armour Slot
This slot is where you place the piece
of Armour you wish to tinker with.
Module Slots
These slots are where you place any
Modules you wish to install on the
piece of armour in the Focused
Armour Slot.
Modules will also go here when
removing Modules from a piece of Armour.
Colour Application Button
This button applies any colours that are
in the Colour Slots to the piece of Armour
in the Focused Armour Slot.
Module Add Button
This button adds any Modules that are in
in the Module Slots to the piece of Armour
in the Focused Armour Slot.
Module Remove Button
This button removes any Modules from
the piece of Armour in the Focused
Armour Slot to the Module Slots.

you will use for the upgrade.

appears if you have a valid recipe.

dimensionalpocketsii.info.shifter_info: Teleport to and from your Pocket from anywhere!
dimensionalpocketsii.info.shifter_shift_: To link: shift-right click this on a Pocket Block.
To use: shift-right click this item facing open air.
To change mode: right-click this item facing air. To Charge: Use a Charger Module.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.shifter_limita: Limited to 5,000,000 FE. Each Shift drains 100,000 FE.

dimensionalpocketsii.info.energy_cell_in: A portable Item that stores FE.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.energy_cell_sh: To Charge: Place inside of a Dimensional Charger Module.
To Change Mode: Shift-right click this item facing air.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.energy_cell_li: Can only charge Items when on your hotbar.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.energy_cell_en: A portable Item that stores FE. High capacity.
To Charge: Place inside of a Dimensional Charger Module.
To Change Mode: Shift-right click this item facing air.
Can only charge Items when on your hotbar.

To use: shift-right click to shift.
Single use. Item is destroyed upon use.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.tome_info: A full guide on Dimensional Pockets II!
dimensionalpocketsii.info.tome_shift_one: Contains crafting recipes, mechanics and more.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.tome_shift_two: To access the Guide, simply right click your Tome.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.charger: Used to charge items with FE Energy.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Charger with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.generat: Used to Generate FE Energy for your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Generator with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.connect: To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Connector with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.focus_s: To create: shift-right click this on any floor block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the focus with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.block.pocket_s: Once placed shift-right click to enter the pocket.
To exit the pocket, simply shift-right click on any wall.
To change colours, simply right-click your Pocket Block, or Connector with your choice of dye.
To pick up: shift-right-click with a Dimensional Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.block.focus: Allows for shifting out of a Pocket, and Elevator functionality.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.block.focus_sh: Once placed shift-right click to exit the Pocket.
Also acts like an Elevator when placed above each other.
Right click to access a UI for configuration.
To pick up: shift-right-click with a Dimensional Wrench.
Can only be placed inside of a Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.crafter: A Crafting Table built into the wall of your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Crafter with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.smithin: A Smithing Table built into the wall of your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Smithing Table with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.furnace: A Furnace built into the wall of your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Furnace with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.blast_f: A Blast Furnace built into the wall of your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Furnace with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.energy_: Real-time display of the Energy level stored in your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Energy Display with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.fluid_d: Real-time display of the Fluid stored in your Pocket.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Fluid Display with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.armour_: Use this to tinker with your Dimensional Armour!
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Armour Workbench with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.upgrade: Use this to upgrade your Dimensional Equipment!
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Upgrade Station with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.anvil: An Anvil built into the wall of your Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.anvil_s: To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Anvil with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.creativ: Provides your Pocket with unlimited Forge Energy (FE)!
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Creative Energy Module with a Wrench.
Provides your Pocket with unlimited Fluid! Provided you have a Fluid stored.
To create: shift-right click this on any wall block inside your Pocket.
To remove: shift-right click on the Creative Fluid Module with a Wrench.
dimensionalpocketsii.info.module.contain: Items and/or Settings have been saved to this Module.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_one_body_two:
This Tome will enable you to
better understand how to use
the mod, with all the recipes
you need to get started!
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_two_body_one:
So, you've decided you want
to explore the world of
Pocket Dimensions?

Well, you have come to the
right place!
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_two_body_two: In this guide, you will learn:
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_two_body_three:
To continue please use either
the tabs on the right side,
or the arrows at the bottom.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_three_body_one:
This is a Pocket Block.
It is the heart of the Mod.
To use it: Shift-right click.
Thats it! It really is that simple.
This will send you to the
Pocket Dimension, into your
own personal Pocket!
A Pocket is a private space
away from everything else.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_three_body_two:
Pockets are highly
configurable. They can
store items, power and fluids
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_three_body_thr:
For instance, you can
configure each side for:
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_three_body_fou:
Simply right click the face
you wish to change with
a wrench:
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body:
Modules are used to interface
with certain aspects of a
Pocket, such as functions
or other uses such as viewing
energy or fluid levels,
storing items and accessing
settings.

Modules are crafted, and
when you need to place one:
Simply shift-right click the
Module onto a wall inside
your Pocket. To retreive a
module, shift-right click the
module with a Wrench.

This chapter shows each
of the modules in the Mod.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_one:
This is a Connector Module.
It is used to interface with
a Pocket from inside your
Pocket.

Use this to Lock & Unlock
your Pocket, add Allowed
Players for Servers, and
much more!
Right-click to access the UI.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_one_:
Connectors are used to
interface between the inside
and outside of your Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_two:
This is a Charger Module. It
is used to charge items,
using FE or Forge Energy.
This module will take FE from
your Pockets' internal
storage, and use it to charge
any item which needs FE.

Some dimensional items
require FE, so this block is
a useful way to charge them.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_two_: This Module has its own UI.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_thre:
This is a Crafter Module. It
is used to craft items,
similar to a Crafting
Bench. A convenient way
to craft inside your
Pocket!

The Crafter Module will craft
exactly the same way
a regular Crafting
Bench will.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_four:
This is a Furnace Module. It
is used to smelt items,
similar to a Vanilla
Furnace. A convenient way
to smelt inside your
Pocket!

The Furnace Module uses fuel
like a regular furnace.
It smelts the same Items
as well. It will store
all its items.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_five:
This is an Energy Display
Module. It displays the
current level of FE
energy that is stored in your
Pocket.

It is a convienent way
of seeing how much FE
you have in your Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_six:
This is an Fluid Display
Module. It displays the
current Fluid and level of
Fluid that is stored in your
Pocket.

It is a convienent way
of seeing what Fluid
you have in your Pocket.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_seve:
This is an Armour Workbench
Module. It allows you to
change the colour of certain
elements of your Dimensional
armour. You can also
tinker with different
modules, such as a Shifter.

This Module has its own UI.
Inside this UI you will
be able to tinker to your
hearts' content!
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_eigh:
This is a FE Generator Module.
It allows you to generate
FE energy from within your
Pocket.

Using burnable fuel, redstone
or a hot Fluid like Lava,
you can create Power for your
tools and armour!
This Module has its own UI.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_nine:
This is an Upgrade Station.
It allows you to upgrade
netherite equipment
to Dimensional Equipment.

Using items found across
Dimensions, improve upon the
best!

The Possibilities are endless!
This Module has its own UI.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_ten:
This is a Dimensional Focus.
It allows you to shift
out of a Pocket if
there are no wall blocks
visible. It can also be used
as an elevator, allowing
you to have levels in
your pocket, without the need
for ladders.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_four_body_ten_: This Module has its own UI.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_five_body:
Dimensional Pockets II
includes many useful Items.

Some are basic, others are
very advanced.

In this chapter you will
learn about the various
items available to you.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_five_body_one:
The wrench is a very
useful Item. It allows you
to tinker with Connectors and
Pocket Blocks without using
a UI.

Most actions only require
a right click, such as
changing the mode of
a Connector.
It is vital to moving a
Pocket Block, as they are
otherwise unbreakable.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_five_body_two:
The Shifters are a
very powerful set of
Items. They allow you to
travel to a Pocket
without interacting with
its' Block. They can also
be used to exit a Pocket.

They remember your position
in the world, so you can
quickly get back to work.
They use energy, so charge
them using a Charger
Module.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_five_body_thre:
Energy Cells are a
set of Items that store
Mass amounts of FE.
They can also charge other
Items in your inventory
so you dont need to visit
a Charging Module as
often.

They only charge other Items
when on your hotbar.
They use energy, so charge
them using a Charger
Module.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_five_body_four:
Ejectors are a last
ditch effort if you are stuck
in a Pocket.
They instantly shift you
to the Overworld
allowing you to escape
a trap or enemy.

They are single use only
and they will be destroyed
when used.
They stack to a max of 4.
They are excellent
for emergencies!
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_nine_body:
There are a multitude of ways
to craft Items from
Dimensional Pockets II.

Most use the Vanilla Crafting
Bench, but some use
special mechanics, such as
the Smithing Table, or the
Upgrade Station.

This chapter will show you
all of the recipes you
need to know to get started.
dimensionalpocketsii.tome_eleven_body_fo:
And of course a massive
thanks to everyone else who
is a member of the Discord
server!
